scripts.types:local: pnpm supabase gen types --lang=typescript --local --schema public> src/schema/default.ts && pnpm run zod && pnpm format:lint
scripts.types:remote: pnpm supabase gen types --lang=typescript --linked --schema public> src/schema/default.ts && pnpm run zod && pnpm format:lint
scripts.seed:local: pnpm supabase db dump -f supabase/seed.sql --local --data-only --exclude public.user,auth.users,auth.identities,auth.audit_log_entries,auth.flow_state,auth.sessions,auth.mfa_amr_claims,auth.one_time_tokens,auth.refresh_tokens && pnpm format:lint
scripts.seed:remote: pnpm supabase db dump -f supabase/seed.sql --linked --data-only --exclude public.user,auth.users,auth.identities,auth.audit_log_entries,auth.flow_state,auth.sessions,auth.mfa_amr_claims,auth.one_time_tokens,auth.refresh_tokens && pnpm format:lint
scripts.zod: pnpm dlx supabase-to-zod --input src/schema/default.ts --output ../utils/src/dbValidators.ts && eslint ../utils/src/dbValidators.ts --fix && prettier ../utils/src/dbValidators.ts --write
